rdf:Description.dc:title: Indian representation on school boards 1982
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Fish, Brian L.
Alberta. Alberta Education. Planning and Research.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton?] : Funded by the Planning and Research Branch, Alberta Education,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Report concludes that it is beyond provincial jurisdiction to legislate that treaty Indians can become trustees on Alberta's school boards.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: School boards
Indians of North America
